graph_title: Proportion d’établissements scolaires offrant des services essentiels, par type de service
indicator_name: Proportion d’établissements scolaires offrant des services essentiels, par type de service
SDG_GOAL: Goal 4: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 4.a: Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 4.a.1: Proportion of schools offering basic services, by type of service
STAT_CONC_DEF: The percentage of schools by level of education (primary education) with access to the given facility or service.
